The "arsenal" you're wielding tells me all I need to know about you. You're here to fight, not to learn. However, I believe you can do both.

These {@LinkCreature:13#300933#ghilliedhus} have abnormal essences. You need more experience in recognizing what's wrong before you can do what's right.

Are you ready to dispel your ignorance with some improvisational forestry?

You might just make it as a researcher after all...if you can get through life without your weapons.

My "watchdogs," Helier and Clovis, ask that you keep using them a while longer. When you're ready, see what they want.

I'm going to be blunt with you, . If you can't see what makes these {@LinkCreature:13#300930#ghilliedhus} "special," you're of no use to the federation, or to me. Just keep doing what you soldiers do best until you've learned to recognize true Heartwood Essence.
